name: CancerDischargeCondition
title: Cancer Discharge Condition
description: Cancer Discharge Conditions used as an exclusion in planned admission/readmission algorithms
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Cancer Discharge Condition that act as an exclusion.),(Data Element Scope: ClaimDiagnosis, ClaimItem.diagnosis, Encounter.diagnosis, Condition),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD10CM cancer diagnosis codes),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
